mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_attempts (exam_id, user_id, total_score, max_score, percentage, submit_time) VALUES (#{examId}, #{userId}, #{totalScore}, #{maxScore}, #{percentage}, #{submitTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exam_attempts WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS exam_id, e.title AS exam_title, e.note_id, MAX(ea.submit_time) AS last_submit_time, (SELECT percentage FROM exam_attempts WHERE exam_id = e.id AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY submit_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS last_percentage, IFNULL(COUNT(ea.id), 0) AS attempt_count FROM exams e LEFT JOIN exam_attempts ea ON e.id = ea.exam_id AND ea.user_id = #{userId} WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY e.id, e.title, e.note_id
